Review_Text: Awesome Documentary.Well made and frighteningly accurate.

I think this documentary did a great job at explaining what the Jehovah Witness religion is all about. As an out sider I didn't know much about the JW religion and this really opened my eyes to how the organization operates. Kudos to the director and the writers!!!

Anytime an ex ( fill in the blank) has a take on something, it's almost always skewed with bias , personal grievance and non objectivity. Sexual abuse is a very serious matter and misinformation or misrepresentation actually diminishes it's important rather than heightens it.
